title: Bug 18705 - Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, it is observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
OB: Run the control example and resize the window in the vertical direction only. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
EB: The flashing issue should be minimized or eliminated in the Control Example when resizing the window in the vertical direction.
SR: Investigate the cause of the excessive flashing in the Control Example when resizing the window in the vertical direction and implement a solution to minimize or eliminate this issue.
